column1: Narrator : The boat accosts on an islet, smaller than NOMBATEAU, with nothing on it.

column2: Narrator : The boat is on an islet. The air is pure and fresh

column1: Narrator : The  NOMBATEAU docks on a small island.
Narrator : Few bushes have growned there and there

column2: Narrator : The boat is on an islet. The air is pure and fresh
column4: PlayerSpeak : Nothing to eat around here

column1: Narrator : NOMBATEAU sets shore on a tiny island.
Narrator : A tall rock stands on the middle

column2: Narrator : The boat is on an islet. The air is pure and fresh
column4: Narrator : The rock is too tall for CAPITAINE to just go up, he’ll need to climb

column6: Narrator : Trying to climb, CAPITAINE falls backwards

column5: PlayerSpeak : At last, there I am

column4: PlayerSpeak : I don’t have any spyglass

column3: PlayerSpeak : We can see much clearer
